  • java.lang.Object

    public class EncoderSimUtil
extends java.lang.Object
implements PeriodicComponent, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    An internal class used for simulating encoder hardware

    • Constructor Detail

      • EncoderSimUtil

        public EncoderSimUtil​(java.lang.String name,
                      int id,
                      int cpr,
                      SpeedController controller,
                      double gearbox_ratio,
                      double max_rpm,
                      double ramp_time)
        Create a new EncoderSim utility
        Parameters:
        name - Wrapper name
        id - Device ID
        cpr - Counts per revolution
        controller - Motor controller
        gearbox_ratio - Gearbox ration between motor and encoder
        max_rpm - Max motor RPM
        ramp_time - Amount of time to get from 0 to 100% in seconds
